parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database instance. The system supports exact search.

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The type of the database. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **SQLServer**
*   **Oracle**
*   **PostgreSQL**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The source of the database instance. Valid values:

*   **Local**
*   **Rds**
*   **PolarDB**

parameters.name: SourceInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraDB RDS instance. The system supports exact search.
